text: 11.21: Ais 23.1-18 naŋga, Ese 26.1—28.26 naŋga, Jol 3.4-8 naŋga, Amo 1.9-10 naŋga, Jna 3.6 naŋga, Sek 9.2-4Kamata ambami, Pɨhu aruru Korasin naŋga Betsaida hati narɨ pɨmɨ aru kavɨrɨmandɨra. Kru mumɨŋga uta pɨhu Tair naŋga Saidon muhɨmɨmuhɨm nzihɨ yi sihɨrahin ŋgandara maña nu ndahara sihɨrahi. Kamati ŋgata, nurɨ atɨnda ñamba vanavana andɨndu haŋɨnɨŋɨrɨm indarɨramata mavɨŋgimɨruhu. Kamata mɨkwɨrɨ kavɨta ahuyɨpuyɨ mɨnzɨta kɨyɨhu.
